input_text:
Job Title: Technical Report Specialist

Location: Cary, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Azzur Lab is looking for a Technical support specialist to perform the administrative duties required to support the laboratory, including but limited to drafting reports, notifications, and invoices from laboratory test results, answering phone calls and greeting visitors, maintaining the inventory of the office area, and assisting in cleaning the office areas.

Responsibilities

 Data entry – transposing data into Excel, Access and writing reports  Manages office and laboratory supply inventory and processes office and laboratory supply orders  Receives/delivers packages, mail, and paperwork  Receives laboratory supplies  Follows technical and non-technical procedures required to process and submit samples. This includes assigning report ID numbers, checking paperwork for accuracy, locating and correcting discrepancies, and recording all processed items.  Forwards accessioned samples to designated laboratory location(s)  Receives client orders and ships materials to clients  Transmits reports and invoices to clients  Drafts and sends client notifications  Performs general laboratory and office cleaning  Answers telephones and routes callers to an appropriate staff person. Correctly takes phone messages and directs messages to the appropriate person.  Assists in the drafting of methods and protocols  Review logbook and documentation for entry errors. 

 Required Education: 

 High school diploma or equivalent 

 Required Work Experience: 

 1-year experience in an administrative function 

Benefits

Fulltime Employment with Azzur can offer you:

Flexible PTOTraining and Growth Opportunities401(k) matchBonus EligibilityMedical BenefitsPaid Holidays

Who We Are

Azzur Group is dedicated to providing clients with efficient, innovative quality and compliance solutions from Discovery to Delivery™. With over 500 industry partners, including 80% of the top pharma/biotech manufacturers in the U.S., Azzur Group provides carefully calibrated and efficiently executed project management, process engineering, and compliance services. As one of the fastest-growing private companies in America, Azzur Group provides clients with consulting, facility solutions, engineering, validation, IT, technical, training, COD, laboratory services, and solutions they need to remain innovative and competitive.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Technical Report Specialist
output_json.summary: Azzur Lab seeks a Technical Report Specialist for administrative duties in Cary, NC.
job_responsibilities: Manages office and laboratory supply inventory
Processes office and laboratory supply orders
Performs general laboratory and office cleaning
Assists in drafting methods and protocols
